content: 12 & 14 inch doll hat girlluvscrochet materials needed * loops and threads soft classic acrylic yarn in bright red * loops and threads soft classic acrylic yarn in off white * 6 00mm j crochet hook * stitch markers * tapestry needle 12 inch hat round 1 chain 2 6dc in magic_ring 6 round 2 double_crochet increase in each st around 12 round 3 double_crochet double_crochet increase x6 18 round 4 2 double_crochet double_crochet increase x6 24 round 5 3 double_crochet double_crochet increase x6 29 round 7-8 double_crochet in each stitch around 29 you could do less or more row depending on the doll you re making it for earflap round 9 double_crochet in the next 6sts chain 2 6 round 10 double_crochet decrease 2 times chain 1 3 round 11 half_double_crochet decrease covering all three stitches slip_stitch fo second earflap join 14 sts after the 1st earflap ch2 then repeat the first earflap you might have to skip more or less sts depending on your doll sew in loose ends for both flaps rim join red yarn to the back of the hat and single_crochet all around slip_stitch to the first st sew in the ends braids next cut four equal strands of red and off white yarn make the yarn slightly longer than the length you want for your braids for the first braid take two strands of each color and fold them in half next using your crochet hook pull the yarn through the tip of the earflap make a larks head knot in the yarn then braid the yarn at the end of your braid make another knot then cut the ends so that they are even repeat for the other side or if you choose to wrap yarn around the bottom of the braid rather than knotting it you can hide the strings at the bottom pom pom you can handmake a pom pom or use a premade one sew the pom pom onto the middle of the hat or you could do two pom poms on either side of the center you have now finished your doll hat 14 inch for the 14 inch hat the pattern is the exact same except you add a row 6 of increases 14 inch doll hat hat round 1 chain 2 6dc in magic_ring 6 round 2 double_crochet increase in each st around 12 round 3 double_crochet double_crochet increase x6 18 round 4 2 double_crochet double_crochet increase x6 24 round 5 3 double_crochet double_crochet increase x6 29 round 6 4 double_crochet double_crochet increase x 4 35 round 7-8 double_crochet in each stitch around 35 you could do less or more row depending on the doll your making it for continue with the original pattern you could also customize this pattern by adding stripes or fun faces happy crocheting you may sell finished products so long as you credit them to me please do not alter the pattern and sell it as your own
